6. Rock: In between the fan of punk and the Argentine (The person who's hobby is dancing is somewhere to the right of the brazilian)
7. Techno: Not Colombian (Fan of techno is not the colombian)

Nationalities:

3. Argentine: Odd Position, Dancing Hobby

5. Indonesian: Punk Hobby
